link_desc:
Recently learned to use the go language to write a small tool for zabbix monitoring mysql database, has the following characteristics:

1. Use the Zabbix Agent Trapper method (actively send collected data to zabbix server, similar to active mode) to monitor mysql database

2. Support encryption of passwords to avoid clear text passwords in configuration files

3. Support SHOW / *! 50001 GLOBAL / STATUS and SHOW /! 50001 GLOBAL * / VARIABLES all indicators monitoring! ! !

4. Support mysql master-slave monitoring (default off, can be opened through the configuration file, mysql users need to have SUPER or REPLICATION CLIENT permission)

5. Support custom collection cycle

Template download: https://dl.cactifans.com/zabbix/zabbix_template_mysql.tar.gz

Tool download: https://dl.cactifans.com/zabbix/zabbix-mymon-0.0.1.x86_64.tar.gz
author: canghai908
